LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Voidstrider.label: 虚空陆行鸟
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Voidstrider.description: This shadow-infused strider embodies the elves' commitment to harness the power of the Void in the name of the Alliance. These shadow-infused striders make ideal companions for elves delving into the powers of the void. Those that follow the void tend to prefer the companionship of a steed without form or substance.
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Voidstrider.tools.0.label: 爪
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Voidstrider.tools.1.label: 喙
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Voidstrider.tools.2.label: 头
